name: Quick Clicks
description:
This is a mini-game where you can test your mouse clicking skills. One might consider this aiming practice for shooters. Well, kinda.

This is still a prototype, so any feedback is appreciated.

I have used, with permission, free music and sound effects in this prototype. Below are the references.

Music is by Teknoaxe - http://teknoaxe.com/Home.php

Sound Effects are by David Fesliyan -  www.fesliyanstudios.com
